HiddenText.Name: Confidentiality
HiddenText.OpenningText: How can I be certain that other group members will not talk about me outside of the group?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Each group memeber agrees to the confidentiality of the information shared in the group prior to joining the group. What is said in groups must remain among the members of the group in order for all members to feel safe and trusting in the group. It is not appropriate for a group memeber to disclose events of the group to an outside person or other group members outside of group outside of group meetings. While the group leaders cannot guarantee that members will maintain group confidentiality outside the group, this is thoroughly discussed and agreed upon with each member prior to joining the group.
